name: data-card-21
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first across all Pokéathlon events.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first across all Pokéathlon events.

flavor_text.black_white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won an event.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times you’ve won an event.
